system.description:
This School of magic is concerned with mastery of fire, including heat and its absence. Wizards adept in this School of magic often gain a rather unfair reputation for a lack of subtlety. Spells from this School require strong, clear gestures to be cast, as well as words of power.

Spontaneous Casting Complexities

ComplexityEffect
0

Ignite flammable objects; inflict Health damage with fire

1

Extinguish a small fire

2

Heat or chill an object; create closely-controlled fire
